item.title: Elixir - 3 reasons why you should be using it
item.description: Let’s go through some major reasons why Elixir and its ecosystem are great for web development. Reason 1: Functional Elixir is a proper functional language. And why is this a good thing ? Because the problem of a web server is a very functional one. Think about it for second....

item.title: How to Suck at Programming #1 - Intro and Getting Religious
item.description: People often ask me how to be a good programmer. The hell if I know. I do know how to suck at programming. So I tend to approach the subject with the so called via negativa. By subtraction. Don’t be a sucker. Its not always clear what is the best...
